plot: A special panel was held during 2011 FedCon, a sci-fi convention in Düsseldorf, Germany, where each of the three Star Trek captains there had a one-hour solo session with the fans. Garret Wang from Star Trek: Voyager hosted the event.
title: Captain's Table
plot_es: A special panel was held during 2011 FedCon, a sci-fi convention in Düsseldorf, Germany, where each of the three Star Trek captains there had a one-hour solo session with the fans. Garret Wang from Star Trek: Voyager hosted the event.
plot_en: A special panel was held during 2011 FedCon, a sci-fi convention in Düsseldorf, Germany, where each of the three Star Trek captains there had a one-hour solo session with the fans. Garret Wang from Star Trek: Voyager hosted the event.
